body: The json feed from mtgjson.com contains a "variations" property which identifies alternative card images. By adding this information to the card script a new feature that lets a player choose from an alternative image for a card can be added to the explorer/deck editor. See also https://groups.google.com/d/msg/magarena/ItBNX-x7znU/wIiRYEUAqnkJ .
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Option to select alternative card image.

comments.body: for future reference, mtgimage.com accepts our current card script file names as jpg. eg: http://mtgimage.com/card/Chorus_of_Might.jpg instead of http://mtgimage.com/card/chorus%20of%20might.jpg

content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on August 09, 2014 15:20:13_

The json feed from mtgjson.com contains a "variations" property which identifies alternative card images. By adding this information to the card script a new feature that lets a player choose from an alternative image for a card can be added to the explorer/deck editor. See also https://groups.google.com/d/msg/magarena/ItBNX-x7znU/wIiRYEUAqnkJ .

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=645_
